sentences.sContent: At least a semblance of normality has been restored to parts of the country.
sentences.sCn: 这个国家的部分地区至少在表面上已恢复正常。

remMethod.val: sembl (相像) + ance → 外表相似 → 伪装

trans.tranOther: If there is a semblance of a particular condition or quality, it appears to exist, even though this may be a false impression
